locales.loc.description: We re glad to see you here. This software is an installation wizard that can help you install the Vortex Launcher. The Vortex Launcher is a powerful tool designed to assist you in managing projects, modules, plugins, and content. After installation, you will be able to create your projects and explore all the amazing features and capabilities that Vortex provides. Enjoy your experience!

locales.loc.error.no_internet_and_builtin: Error: Network usage is disabled and there no builtin launcher. Cannot proceed with installation.

locales.loc.install.description: Install Vortex Launcher from repository, or from this local installer

locales.loc.install.no_internet: No internet connexion, you need to have a built-in launcher.

locales.loc.install.no_builtin: No builtin launcher, you need to have a internet connexion.

locales.loc.install.builder_is_older: The built-in launcher is older or innexistant. We recommend using insternet to download the latest version.

locales.loc.install.builder_is_newer: The built-in launcher is newer. We recommend using it to get better performances.

locales.loc.install.install_path: Path where Vortex will be installed

locales.loc.install.install_summary: Install Vortex Launcher from repository, or from this local installer

locales.loc.install.offline_mode: Offline mode, the web installation is not available.

locales.loc.install.wait_fetch: Waiting to fetch online Vortex Launcher versions, please wait.

locales.loc.install.install_path_already_exist: CAUTION : The installation directory already exist. This installation will erase everything !

locales.loc.install.erase_and_install: Erase the folder and install Vortex
